entry.title: How to install jekyll üíâ on Windows OS

link.title: How to install jekyll üíâ on Windows OS

entry.content:
Download Ruby

For first we need to download ruby ‚Üí

Run ruby installation on your device, next step open command prompt terminal - or press windows logo and type CMD

Run this command gem install jekyll bundler

Now you can check your jekyll version by run this command jekyll -v

Download Starter Themes

Next you can download our jekyll starter themes , Download Jekyll Starter Now ‚Üí

Run Starter themes

Now you can run the starter project in to your devices, extract our starter jekyll project in to your project, open terminal and access the starter project - Next step you can run bundle install && exec jekyll serve

Open your web browser and access localhost:4000
entry.summary: Simple step how to install Jekyll on Windows OS

entry.title: How to install üë®üèª‚ÄçüöÄ Astro Js on Windows OS

link.title: How to install üë®üèª‚ÄçüöÄ Astro Js on Windows OS

entry.content:
Download Node Js

For run astro js project , you need to download node js ‚Üí

Download and run installation node js in to your devices.

Astro Js Starter Project

Now you can download astro js starter project, download astro js starter now ‚Üí

Run Astro Js Project

Next step you can extract astro js starter project in to your project folder - open terminal and run npm run dev and open localhost:4321 or for astro v.1 , v.s you can open on localhost:3000
entry.summary: Simple Step how to install Eleventy 11ty on Windows OS

entry.title: How to install üê≠ Eleventy 11ty on Windows OS

link.title: How to install üê≠ Eleventy 11ty on Windows OS

entry.content:
Download Node Js

For run eleventy 11ty project , you need to download node js ‚Üí

Download and run installation node js in to your devices.

Eleventy Starter Project

Now you can download eleventy 11ty starter project, download eleventy 11ty starter now ‚Üí

Run Eleventy Project

Next step you can extract eleventy starter project in to your project folder - open terminal and run npm run dev and open localhost:8080
entry.summary: Simple step how to install Eleventy 11ty on Windows OS
